column4: could some1 help me change the ownership of a file/foler/ chown root filename but error msg states that the file is read only
how do i change the ownership of file or folder. the file i have is read only and it wont let me change the ownership
i have been trying with sudo
Likely the drive the file is on is mounted read-only for some reason, like NTFS filesystem without ntfs-3g driver for instance
